entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
